summary: The implementation successfully covers all 9 requirements (REQ-33 through REQ-41) related to GPS-based nearby salon discovery and location management. Backend changes include optional latitude/longitude fields on Salon type, updateSalonLocation function with admin authorization, and migration support. Frontend changes include admin location management UI, GPS permission flow, Haversine distance calculation utility, distance display, dynamic sorting by proximity, dynamic heading based on location permission, and the booking notice text. All acceptance criteria appear satisfied based on the diff evidence.
